00032 #ifndef MINIHASHTABLE_H
00033 #define MINIHASHTABLE_H
00034 
00035 //Next defines are used in HashTable. Uncomment if HashTable is not present
00036 #define INITIAL_SIZE    1048576
00037 #define SEED    1159241
00038 #define HASHFN  bitwisehash
00039 
00040 #include <stdlib.h>
00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include <string.h>
00043 
00044 typedef struct minihashrec {
00045     char *word;
00046     unsigned int id;
00047     struct minihashrec *next;
00048 } MINIHASHREC;
00049 
00050 class MiniHashTable {
00051 public:
00052     MiniHashTable();
00053     int TSIZE;
00054     int globalId;
00055     bool useAsCount;
00056     void inithashtable();
00057     void inithashtable(int size);
00058     void inithashtable(int size, bool count); //use as count (assign the same first id)
00059     MINIHASHREC ** get();
00060     MINIHASHREC * get(unsigned pos);
00061     MINIHASHREC * hashsearch(char *w);
00062     MINIHASHREC * hashupdate(char *w);
00063     void delete_key(char *w);
00064     MINIHASHREC * hashinsert(char *w);
00065     MINIHASHREC * hashinsert(char *w, unsigned int id);
00066     void dump();
00067     unsigned int bitwisehash(char *word, int tsize, unsigned int seed);
00068     int scmp(char *s1, char *s2);
00069     ~MiniHashTable();
00070     int size();
00071 private:
00072     MINIHASHREC **hash;
00073     int numNodes;
00074 };
00075 
00076 #endif /*MINIHASHTABLE_H_*/
